rule: The output must always consist of only one word, which represents a valid part-of-speech tag from the provided alphabetical list or one of the accepted non-list options, "Unknown" or "CantAnswer".
complianceText:
The chatbot output consists of a single tag, 'NN', which is a valid part-of-speech tag listed in the description. The output adheres to the requirement of returning only the part-of-speech tag.
OK
